name: Lone Wolf Nano
description:
Welcome to the end of the world, and the story of one lost wolf. Our protagonist, codenamed Nano, is but one among many 'gifted' individuals wandering through what once was a city full of people. But something happened... something unexplainable... And what followed... may be even worse... 

Can you really trust someone you just met? Should you even try to evade danger if it only a matter of time?

This is my project for the 2022 NaNoRen0 Game Jam,  and bit of an excuse to take a little break from my other ongoing project, Love Company.

 That one hits a bit close to home... but I guess you could say the same about this one, with some extrapolation.

This game contains partial nudity and dark themes.

Story, programming and art: Shibakita

Proofreading and playtesting: Sean W
